changeSet.createView: SELECT bracket.id ,IFNULL(bracket.uuid, '') AS uuid ,bracket.fk_object_type_id ,project.fk_client_id ,IFNULL(project.name, '') AS project_name ,IFNULL(client.name, '') AS client_name ,bracket.fk_project_id ,IFNULL(bracket.name, '') AS name ,IFNULL(bracket.description, '') AS description ,bracket.fk_attribute_id ,bracket."fk_object_type_id_as_searchFilter" ,bracket.fk_object_persistence_method_id ,bracket.fk_datamanagement_process_id FROM bracket LEFT JOIN project ON project.id = bracket.fk_project_id LEFT JOIN client ON client.id = project.fk_client_id;
